help-job-ineligible.description: Screenshot of a job listing with error message stating lack of eligibility

help-saved-searches.description: Screenshot of the saved searches screen highlighting the edit, view, and delete buttons. The edit button allows you to edit search criteria. The view button lets you view current search results.

help-job-cart.description: Screenshot of the job cart showing the list of saved jobs

help-job-application.description: Screenshot of a completed online job application

help-job-apply-offline.description: Screenshot of statement of consent to add your name as an applicant to a job

help-plc-detail.description: Screenshot of a placement detail with transaction selection dropdown expanded showing hire and promotion transactions

help-docs.description: Screenshot of uploaded documents list and forms list showing an I-9.
